title: Growing Gaming And Entertainment Industry Fuels Growth In
text:
Growing Gaming And Entertainment Industry Fuels Growth In The structured light 3D scanner Market : Pivotal Factor Influencing Structured Light 3D Scanner Market Growth in 2025 07-31-2025 06:39 AM CET | IT, New Media & Software
Press release from: The Business Research Company Structured Light 3D Scanner Market
Use code ONLINE30 to get 30% off on global market reports and stay ahead of tariff changes, macro trends, and global economic shifts
Structured Light 3D Scanner Market Size Growth Forecast: What to Expect by 2025?
The market for structured light 3D scanner has experienced swift expansion over the past few years. Its size is set to increase from $1.6 billion in 2024 to $1.88 billion in 2025, with a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 17.7%. Factors contributing to the growth during the historic period encompass an increase in automation, efforts in cultural heritage preservation, a surge in demand for reverse engineering, emphasis on safety, escalating use in surveying and mapping, and a rise in demand for 3D modelling.
How Will the Structured Light 3D Scanner Market Size Evolve and Grow by 2029?
The market size for the structured light 3D scanner is anticipated to experience an accelerated expansion in the coming years, reaching an estimated value of $3.56 billion by 2029, with a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 17.4%. Factors contributing to this growth over the forecast period are higher implementation rates in construction and architectural industries, amplified demand from the automotive sector, burgeoning e-commerce and online retail, combined with the reduction in costs and accessibility. Governmental initiatives and regulations. Key trends anticipated during this forecast period involve the use of drone technology, advancements in healthcare applications, improvement in software solutions, advent of portable and handheld scanners, and incorporation of augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR).

What Drivers Are Propelling the Growth of Structured Light 3D Scanner Market Forward?
The structured light 3D scanner market is projected to expand due to the increasing growth of the gaming and entertainment industry. The sector encompasses those engaged in the production, creation, and distribution of recreational and interactive content that entertains the audience. The escalating gaming and entertainment industry growth is attributed to the popularity of esports and online gaming, the advent of augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) technologies, and the widespread use of smartphones and tablets. The realistic character modelling and immersive virtual environments in the gaming and entertainment experiences are enhanced by structured-light 3D scanners. Game developers employ these scanners to capture three-dimensional models of actors, real-world objects, and props. These scanned models become the basis for the creation of realistic items, people, and creatures within the gaming universe. For example, the American Gaming Association, a US-based national trade organization, reported in May 2023 that a robust demand for gaming entertainment led to a historical high in commercial gaming revenue of $60 billion in 2022, a 14% rise from the previous year. As a result, the burgeoning gaming and entertainment industry is bolstering the growth of the structured light 3D scanner market.

Which Emerging Trends Are Transforming the Structured Light 3D Scanner Market in 2025?
Leading businesses in the structured light 3D scanner market are intensifying their efforts towards producing innovative products such as zoom-enabled optical 3D scanners to enhance their market revenue. A zoom-enabled optical 3D scanner is a special category of scanning device that employs optical technology to gather three-dimensional data of objects. This scanner provides the unique ability to adjust its optical zoom level, facilitating users to capture detailed 3D data at diverse magnification levels. For example, in March 2024, an industrial technology company based in Sweden, Hexagon AB, introduced the SmartScan VR800. This product represents the first optical 3D scanner in the market featuring a motorized zoom lens that provides users with full customization of software settings for data resolution and measurement volume. The SmartScan VR800 comes with sophisticated features such as Smart Resolution, Smart Zoom, and Smart Snap, enabling users to quickly alter data resolution, measurement volume, and document orientation data.
What Are the Key Segments in the Structured Light 3D Scanner Market?
The structured light 3D scanner market covered in this report is segmented -
1) By Product: Optical Scanner, Structured Light Scanner, Laser Scanner
2) By Range: Short Range, Medium Range, Long Range
3) By Component: Hardware, Software, Services
4) By Application: Quality Control And Inspection, Reverse Engineering, Virtual Simulation, Face Or Body Scanning, Other Applications
5) By End Users: Aerospace And Defense, Healthcare, Architecture And Construction, Entertainment And Media, Automotive, Other End Users
Subsegments:
1) By Optical Scanner: Handheld Optical Scanner, Desktop Optical Scanner
2) By Structured Light Scanner: 2D Structured Light Scanner, 3D Structured Light Scanner
3) By Laser Scanner: Handheld Laser Scanner, Stationary Laser Scanner

Who Are the Key Players Shaping the Structured Light 3D Scanner Market's Competitive Landscape?
Major companies operating in the structured light 3D scanner market are Carl Zeiss Optotechnik GmbH, Hexagon AB, Nikon Metrology NV, Trimet, 3D Digital Corporation, FARO Technology Inc., GOM GmbH, Creaform Inc., Shining 3D Tech, Basis Software Inc., Perceptron Inc., Steinbichler Optotechnik GmbH, Capture 3D, Artec 3D, Solutionix Corporation, Kreon Technologies, Breuckmann GmbH & Co. KG, Exact Metrology, Riegl Laser Measurement Systems, EVA Optic, ScanTech International Inc., ShapeGrabber Inc., RangeVision, True Point Laser Scanning LLC, Fuel 3D
What Geographic Markets Are Powering Growth in the Structured Light 3D Scanner Market?
North America was the largest region in the structured light 3D scanner market in 2024. Asia-Pacific is expected to be the fastest-growing region in the forecast period. The regions covered in the structured light 3D scanner market report are Asia-Pacific, Western Europe, Eastern Europe, North America, South America, Middle East, Africa.
